item.title: Andrew Brewer the Rock n Roll Psychic - Apr 22,2009
item.description:
Join Marci and Art as we welcome Andrew Brewer the Rock n Roll Psychic. We will be talking to Andrew about his journey to realizing his Psychic abilities and later maybe Andrew will do some readings. Andrew Brewer, “The Rock n Roll Psychic”, is a nationally televised clairvoyant and astrologer and host of “Rock n Roll Psychic Radio”, heard on Monday and Friday evenings at 7 PM EST on Blogtalk Radio. Andrew has over one hundred appearances to his credit on radio and TV, perhaps most notably as the featured psychic and co-host, along with Erik Estrada (“Chips”) and Jenilee Harrison (“Three’s Company”), of “Kebrina’s Psychic Answer”, which aired throughout the United States and Canada from 1992-94. Andrew was the resident morning psychic for many years on Magic 99.7 FM—Columbus’ leading Rock station—and was also featured in a segment on “PM Magazine”. A talented writer, Andrew has published articles on a wide variety of metaphysical topics. He was at one time a featured columnist in “The Free Press” and has been featured, and quoted, in front page articles in both “The Los Angeles Times” and “USA Today”.

Andrew Brewer | psychic readings | Paranormal | Truth Beyond Reality | Spiritualality
